posts.post_content:
"The [foulest stench](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=33722) is in the air  
The funk of forty thousand years  
And [grizzly ghouls](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=34819) from every [tomb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=131005)  
Are closing in to seal your doom"  
  
You see, there certainly *is* a reason why that guy in the artwork is dancing the Thriller!

posts.post_content:
What an oddly specific card, even for a landwalk-hoser. This would be a waste of a card slot or two, even in a sideboard. I mean, what has swampwalk? [Bog Wraith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bog Wraith)? [Sol'kanar the Swamp King](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sol'kanar the Swamp King)? [Mire Boa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mire Boa)?  
  
Okay, okay... So there are a few creatures with swampwalk... Is there an instant-speed card that target landwalk creatures for damage?
posts.html:
